entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
